HomePage.title: Scale Your Business with Advanced Technology
HomePage.description: Leverage cutting-edge AI, data-driven insights, and agentic technology to transform your ideas into production-ready solutions faster than ever.

ServicesPage.title: We're a Technology Solutions Provider and Innovation Hub
ServicesPage.subtitle: Innovation - Cloud - Blockchain - DevOps
ServicesPage.description: We build breakthrough products and provide expert consulting services across emerging technologies.

rapidMvp.title: Rapid MVP
rapidMvp.description: Transform your ideas into working products quickly. We help you validate your concept and get to market faster with our agile development approach.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Streamline your operations with intelligent automation solutions. We build custom workflows and integrate AI to reduce manual tasks and boost efficiency.

blockchain.title: Blockchain
blockchain.description: Leverage the power of decentralized technology. We develop secure, scalable blockchain solutions for various use cases from DeFi to enterprise applications.

innovationAi.title: Innovation & AI
innovationAi.description: Stay ahead with cutting-edge AI solutions. We help businesses implement advanced machine learning and AI technologies to create intelligent, adaptive systems.

description.main: We are a multidisciplinary team of innovators, developers, and visionaries from across Latin America, united by our passion for breakthrough technology and exceptional software development.
description.locations: Based in Ecuador, Brazil, and Costa Rica, we bring together diverse perspectives and expertise to create solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible with emerging technologies like StarkNet, blockchain, and artificial intelligence.
description.cta: Join us in building the next generation of transformative digital solutions.

globalTalent.title: Global Talent
globalTalent.description: A diverse team spanning Ecuador, Brazil, and Costa Rica, bringing unique perspectives to every project.

cuttingEdgeStack.title: Cutting-Edge Stack
cuttingEdgeStack.description: Leveraging StarkNet, AI, and blockchain technology to build the next generation of decentralized applications.

innovationFocus.title: Innovation Focus
innovationFocus.description: Dedicated to pushing boundaries in blockchain, AI, and cloud computing to solve real-world challenges.

ContactPage.title: Get in Touch
ContactPage.description: Ready to start your next project? We'd love to hear from you.

name.label: Name
name.error: Name must be at least 2 characters.

email.label: Email
email.error: Please enter a valid email address.

subject.label: Subject
subject.error: Subject must be at least 5 characters.

message.label: Message
message.error: Message must be at least 10 characters.

success.title: Success!
success.description: Your message has been sent. We'll get back to you soon.

error.title: Error
error.description: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
